intro: Trigonia mollis, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its velvety, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of showy, tubular flowers. Trigonia mollis is widely cultivated as a decorative plant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
